TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DbDataSourceEnumerator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a mechanism for enumerating all available instances of database servers within the local network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides the basis for other strongly typed data source enumerators.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataSourceEnumerator> class provides the basis for strongly typed enumerators such as <xref:System.Data.Sql.SqlDataSourceEnumerator>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetDataSources() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a containing information about all visible instances of the server represented by the strongly typed instance of this class.
Docs.returns: Returns a containing information about the visible instances of the associated data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The table returned by this method contains the following columns, all of which contain strings. Individual providers may add additional columns.
|Column ordinal|Column|Description| |--------------------|------------|-----------------| |0|**ServerName**|Name of the server.| |1|**InstanceName**|Name of the server instance. Depending on the provider, multiple instances can exist on a single server.| |2|**IsClustered**|Indicates whether the server is part of a cluster.| |3|**Version**|Version of the server. Exact format varies by provider.| |4|**FactoryName**|Name of the corresponding provider factory.|
